content: - balaheenarum paapikalumaaya njangalutemel anu grahangalum karunayum, randu lokangalilum ennume nnekkum choriyappetumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: pattakkaaran:- dyvamaaya kartthaave! Paripaakathayulla natapatikalaal njangal thirumumpaake prashobhicchuko ndu, ninneyum nin്re pithaavineyum ninte vishuddharu haayeyum, itavitaathe sthuthikkuvaan thakkavannam, ee ninte moonnaamdivasatthe uyirtthezhunnelpinnaaline, svarggasenakalotukoote vetippilum vishuddhiyilum puka zhtthuvaan, njangale yogyaraakkaname.

content:
1. Ee nin uththaanatthin naal
vamshatthalayaam-aadam modikkum
/tnaathaa! Sarvveshaa! Krupa cheythennil.

2. Ninne mruthanaayavar kabaril
mudrakkallum kaavalumaayu vacchaar
/tnaathaa..

6. Devaa! Sthuthi nin karunaykkum
rakshakane! Nin-krupayathinum nithyam.
/tnaathaa…

en naathaa! Nin krupa ninne
ippaapikalil chaayicchu.
Nin sleebaacchirakil thoongum
nin sabhamel krupa thonnenam.

Athishakthi mahatthuvangalathaal
mrutharitayeennetton mashihaa!
Durithakkataleennaatiyaare
karunayotezhunnelpikkenam.

Ninnuththaanatthinte vishu-
ddhothsavamaamee divasatthil
nin krupaye sthothram cheyvaan
njangate paapam mochikka.

Krobakal jeevamaratthottam
kaattheerayar mashihaakkabarum
pallikal dayaraakaluminnee
uththaanam kondaatunnu.

sharanatthaale urangeetum
mruthare modippicchavane!
Modippicchatiyaare nin
valamaakkanamuththaanatthaal.

items.content: pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththicchu kartthaavinotu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Njangalotu karu na cheythu njangale sahaayikkaname.
pattakkaaran:- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum puka zhchayum, maanjupokaattha nalla unnathiyum, ellaa ypozhum itavitaathe karettuvaan njangal yogyaraa yittheeraname.

Thiruvishtatthaal maranatthinaayi varukayum, snehaadhikyatthaal kabarilekku praveshikkukayum cheytha nalla utayavanum, manushyarekkuricchu snehamulla vanum sakalatthil ninnum uyarnnirikkunna athyunnatha num, svabhaavatthil adrushyanum, naanaa dhanangalum vaari etukkappetunna bhandaaramulla dhanavaanum, ellaa bhaaganga lilekkum svanthanikshepangale vibhajicchu kotukkunna vanumaaya mashihaathampuraane! Ninakku sthuthi. Sandhyaa praarththanayute ee samayatthum, sakala perunnaaluka lilum, nerangalilum, naazhikakalilum, njangalute aayu shkaalamokkeyilum sthuthiyum bahumaanavum aaraa dhanayum ninakku yogyamaakunnu. Bkulahoon ...

pattakkaaran:- njangalute dyvamaaya mashihaa! Nin്re rakshaa karamaaya natapatiyaalum manushyarekkuricchulla nin്re divya snehatthaalum, kaatholikavum, glyhikavumaaya nin്re sabhaye sakala purajaathikalil ninnum theranje tutthu, athine nin്re vishuddharakthatthaal vilaykka vaangi, mahatthuvamulla manavaattiyaakkittheertthu. Njangale ninte makkalum avakaashavumaakkittheerkkukayum, maranatthinteyum saatthaan്reyum atimayil ninnu svaatha nthuyappetutthi rakshikkukayum, ninnekkuricchulla ari vinte yogyathayulla prakaashatthaal prashobhippikkukayum cheythirikkunnu. Kartthaave! Njangalum ninte makkal ellaavarum nin്re divyakalppanakal aacharikku kayum, avaye dhyaanikkukayum, raavum pakalum ninte pramaanangalin prakaaram natannu, ninnil santhoshikku kayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Jeevippikkunnathaaya ninte suvi shesham njangal prasamgikkukayum, anyajaathikaluteyum svajaathikaluteyum itayil nin്re evangeliyon vahikkukayum, vishuddha shleehanmaarum ariyippukaaraaya deerghadarshimaarum njangalkku orukkitthannittulla maargga tthotu chernnu athilkooti natakkukayum, avarute chovulla kaalatikal pinthutarukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Ninte divya thiruvishtatthaal njangalellaavarum poornna thappetukayum, nee avarkku kotutthittulla mahatthuvatthil njangal kireetam dharippikkappetukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Vishvaasikalaaya nin്re janangalkku nin്re kalppanakalute rahasyam njangal kaanicchukotukkayum, jeevanteyum santhoshatthinte്reyum vachanam avarotu prasamgikkuka yum, ninte mahimayute prakaashatthaal njangal prasho bhikkukayum, nin്re aathmiya uravayil ninnu njangal dhaaraalamaayi pushttippetukayum, nin്re jeevapaaneeyatthaal njangal poornnamaayi samthruptharaakukayum cheyyumaaraa kaname. Njangal nithyavum maadhuryamulla gaanangalum chercchayulla sthuthikalum, kabarilninnulla nin്re uyirtthezhunnelppin്re mahatthuvakaramaaya perunnaalil ninakku karettumaaraakaname. Ellaa neravum itavitaathe aanandakaramaaya sthothrangal ninakkum prathyekam maha tthuvamullathum, athbhutham niranjirikkunnathum, vismayaneeyangalum, mahimayulla athishayapravartthanangalotukoo tiyathumaaya nin്re uyirtthezhunnelpinum, anaykku maaraakaname, nin്re karunaykkaayi nokkippaarkkuka yum, nin്re kurishilttharappine ettuparayukayum, ninte dyvathvatthil vishvasikkukayum cheyyunna ninte itavakaykku samaadhaanavum nin്re sabhaykku nirappum saujanyamaayi nalkaname. Sathyavishvaasatthotu koote athilninnu yaathra purappettirikkunna vishvaasikalaaya maricchupoyavarkku svarggatthilninnulla ninte ezhunnallatthudivasatthil nin്re valathubhaagatthulla impavum aanandavum kotukkaname. Njangalum vishvaasamulla sabhayute makkal ellaavarum ninakkum nin്re pithaavinum, vishuddharoohaaykkum, ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum, sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakaname.
pattakkaaran:- dyvatthilninnu katangalkku parihaaravum, paapangalkku mochanavum, randu lokangalilum enne kkum naam kykkollumaaraakatte.

content:
1. Naathan mrutharitayilurappi-cchaadatthe'
“khedikkendaa nin paapatthe-or-tthiniyum nee
nee kuttam cheythathinallo njaan kondatikal
edankani nee thinnathinaayu kayppum-kuticchen njaan
/tnagnathayaal-nee ilakal chaartthi
/tnagnathayotenneyavar thookki
njaan chinthiya rakthatthaal poyu kopam thaathan്re.

2. Modikka vishuddhasabhe! Nammute naathan
moonnaam naalil jeeviccha-kkaberee-nnezhunnettaan
paapatthe kolayaal konnaan-mruthiye mruthiyaal
krobakal kuntham thaanettakkuntha-tthaal neekki
/t than kabaraal-theertthaan kabarnaasham
/tthannuththaa-naalinguyireki
ettiva thaan pokki vazhitthettellaam njangalute.

3. Than shuddhashareeram bhakshi-cchuyirekum
raktham paanam cheytha mrutharkkaayu naam-praarththikka
azhivillaa loka'tthavar than dehikal melum
paapathamasaathmaakkalilum-vaazhaay-vaan thanne.
/tavaraathmaa-kkale neekkiya naathaa!
/tettavar cho-nnaar nin skkeeppaa'ye
nin valabhaagatthu nirutthee-tenam-neeyavare.

items.content: pattakkaaran:- gogultthaayute mukalil kaazhchayanaykka ppetukayum, skeeppaayilekkulla karettatthaal loka tthin്re anyaayam pariharikkukayum cheytha punyappe tutthunna baliyum, samyojippundaakunna dhoopakalashavumaaya en്re kartthaave! Balaheenaraaya nin്re atiyaa raaya njangal arppicchirikkunna nisaaramaaya ee dhoopam manushyarotulla nin്re sneham moolam kykkollana me athu nin്re bahumaanatthin്re mahaashuddhasthalatthekku praveshikkumaaraakaname. Nin്re atukkal ninnu njanga lute katangalkkum paapangalkkum parihaaravum mocha navum ayacchutharukayum, nin്re manushyasneham moolam njangalute maricchupoyavare aashvasippikkukayum cheyya name. Moraan vaalohaan lolmeen. Aammeen

content:
nin murivukaleennetten moo-ron manamen naathaa!
Ninnadharangalaho pattin-noolototthulloo
/tkaanmaan vanno-nenne bhatar chutti
/tgogultthaayi-kkavare vittoti,
nin maarvva thurannum, raktham-vaarnnum kanden njaan.
Kurishaalatiyaare kaakkum-naathannaayu sthothram
/thaaleluyyaa-attahasikkunnen.

enne mayakki nin nal saundaryaa-shcharyangal.
Ninsthuthi dyvasuthaa paataan-svaramivanillonnum
/tpithruvalamaayu ni-nne kandan melil
/tkallanmaar than itayilumaazhatthil
nin shayya maricchor maddhye-svarggam nin peedtam
eerayar melum narar keezhum-naathannaayu sthothram
/thaaleluyyaa-attahasikkunnu.

njangal than mruthare neeyor-tthekeetaashvaasam.
Chaartthi snaane madbahaayil ninne ul-kkondaar
/tnin shuddhasharee-ratthe bhakshicchu
/tnin rakthakkaa-saa paanam cheythor
abaraahatthotu nin raajya-tthaanandicchaartthum,
nin valamaayu ninnum, ninne sthothram cheyyenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-nalkeetaashvaasam.

haale... Haale... Svarggam santhoshikkum bhoovaanandikkum
mashihaaraajan thannuththaanatthil. Haaleluyyaa.

makkalilappan krupa cheythu pole haa
bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum. ...
/tpullinu thulyam naranute naalkalaho haa
/tpookkunnithu vayalil pooccheti pole. Haa ..

sharanatthaale nin krupayil
maranamatanjoru daasare nin
jeevasvaramathunartthaname
kabareennudyaanatthinnaayu.

rakshakane! Nin gaathratthe-bhakshicchum nin
vilayerum rakthakkaasaa-paanam cheythum
mrutharaayore naasham nee-kki jeevippi-
cchaniyenam ninne nokku-nnavaril kaanthi.

mruthare jeevippippaanezhu-nnallum raajaa
mukilazhakin melaaghoshitha-naayeetunnu.
Nayavaanmaar than munkompin-naadam ketti-
ttenkiyaninjethirelpaanaayu poyeetunnu.

1. Uththaanatthaal thansabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shyno nalki than prajaye kaakkenam nee.

2 aanandamezhunneetumathin്re konukalil nin
shyno kottaykkoppam mevi kaattheetenam.

3. Nin shlommo than vaathilu kaakkenam nin shyno
vannangati vepporellaarum kandeetenam.

4. Sthuthyan sabhaye theertthathine kaattheetum thaathan
vandyan kolayaal-sadyayathinne-keetum puthran

5. Kabaree-nnuyir poondoru suthanaayu ellaa- jaathi-
kkaaril ninnum-vandana-koottum-roohaa sthu-thyan.

6. Vinman lokarkkykyam nalkeetum shy-no nin
uththaanatthaal nin sabhayil shyno nalkenam.

shuddhan nee aaloho!
Shuddhan nee balavaane!
Krooshettone! Mruthiheenaa! Parishuddhan nee krupa cheytheetaname. +

naathaa! Krupa cheytheetaname
naathaa! Kanivaal krupa cheyka
naathaa! Karmmavumarththanakalumettittavayaal krupa cheytheetaname.

Sthothram the deveshaa!
Sthothram the srashtaave!
Sthothram paapikalatiyaaril-krupa cheytheetummashihaa raajaave!
